languages.text: "Как единственный глас династии на этом корабле — почту за честь. Покуда ваши вопросы учтивы, я отвечу на каждый из них".

traits.locale_text: "Как единственный глас династии на этом корабле — почту за честь. Покуда ваши вопросы учтивы, я отвечу на каждый из них".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honour. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."
languages.original_text: "Как единственный глас династии на этом корабле — почту за честь. Покуда ваши вопросы учтивы, я отвечу на каждый из них".

traits.locale_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honor. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honor. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honor. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honor. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honour. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我是我们家族在这艘船上唯一的发言人，这是我的荣幸。只要你问的问题符合礼仪，我就愿意一一解答。”
languages.original_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honour. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."

traits.locale_text: “我是我们家族在这艘船上唯一的发言人，这是我的荣幸。只要你问的问题符合礼仪，我就愿意一一解答。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honour. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."

languages.text: «Como única portavoz de mi familia en la nave, es un honor. Mientras sus preguntas sean corteses, las contestaré todas».
languages.original_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honour. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."

traits.locale_text: «Como única portavoz de mi familia en la nave, es un honor. Mientras sus preguntas sean corteses, las contestaré todas».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この船で唯一の一族の代弁者として、光栄に思います。あなたの質問が礼儀正しいものである限り、私はそのすべてにお答えしましょう」
languages.original_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honour. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."

traits.locale_text: 「この船で唯一の一族の代弁者として、光栄に思います。あなたの質問が礼儀正しいものである限り、私はそのすべてにお答えしましょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Als einzige Stimme unserer Familie auf diesem Schiff ist es eine Ehre. So lange Eure Fragen höflich sind, werde ich jede einzelne beantworten."
languages.original_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honour. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Als einzige Stimme unserer Familie auf diesem Schiff ist es eine Ehre. So lange Eure Fragen höflich sind, werde ich jede einzelne beantworten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « En tant qu'unique représentante de notre famille sur ce vaisseau, ce serait pour moi un grand honneur. Tant que vos questions demeurent courtoises, je prendrai plaisir à vous répondre. »
languages.original_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honour. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."

traits.locale_text: « En tant qu'unique représentante de notre famille sur ce vaisseau, ce serait pour moi un grand honneur. Tant que vos questions demeurent courtoises, je prendrai plaisir à vous répondre. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ailemizin bu gemideki tek temsilcisi olarak seve seve bahsederim. Sorularında saygıda kusur etmediğin sürece hepsine cevap veririm."
languages.original_text: "As the only voice of our family on this vessel, it is an honour. As long as your questions are courteous, I will answer every one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Bu gemide ailemizin tek temsilcisi olarak seve seve bahsederim. Sorularında saygıda kusur etmediğin sürece hepsine cevap veririm."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
